title: Contributing to universe
text: outlines propose change universe.

title: Contributing to universe
text: can fix typos, spelling mistakes, grammatical errors documentation directly using GitHub web interface, long changes made source file. generally means ’ll need edit roxygen2 comments .R, .Rd file. can find .R file generates .Rd reading comment first line.

title: Contributing to universe
text: want make bigger change, ’s good idea first file issue make sure someone team agrees ’s needed. ’ve found bug, please file issue illustrates bug minimal reprex (also help write unit test, needed). See tidyverse guide create great issue advice.

title: Contributing to universe
text: install dependencies universe, including dependencies needed development, call, root runiverse Git repository:
code: # All Imports and Suggests dependencies pak::pak() # Then install packages like roxygen2 add-ons pak::pak(dependencies = "Config/Needs/build")

title: Contributing to universe
text: Fork package clone onto computer. haven’t done , can use usethis::create_from_github("ropenscilabs/runiverse", fork = TRUE). Install development dependencies pak::pak() pak::pak(dependencies = "Config/Needs/build"), make sure package passes R CMD check running devtools::check(). R CMD check doesn’t pass cleanly, ’s good idea ask help continuing. Create Git branch pull request (PR). can use usethis, GitHub Desktop, etc. Make changes, commit git, create PR. title PR briefly describe change. body PR contain Fixes #issue-number.

title: Contributing to universe
text: New code follow tidyverse style guide. can use styler package apply styles, please don’t restyle code nothing PR. use roxygen2, Markdown syntax, documentation. aspire document internal functions using devtag (thus documented yet). use testthat unit tests httptest2. Please add test cases change proposing, ask us help.

title: Contributing to universe
text: strive align script test names. goal code R/name.R tested tests/testthat/test-name.R. allows easy toggling two files thanks usethis::use_test() usethis::use_r().

title: Contributing to universe
text: Please note universe project released Contributor Code Conduct. contributing project agree abide terms.

what: APPENDIX: How to apply the Apache License to your work
title: Apache License
text: apply Apache License work, attach following boilerplate notice, fields enclosed brackets [] replaced identifying information. (Don’t include brackets!) text enclosed appropriate comment syntax file format. also recommend file class name description purpose included “printed page” copyright notice easier identification within third-party archives.
code: Copyright [yyyy] [name of copyright owner]  Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance with the License. title: universe
text: can install development version universe r-universe: development version universe GitHub : Documentation available https://docs.ropensci.org/universe.
code: install.packages("universe", repos = "https://ropensci.r-universe.dev") # install.packages("pak") pak::pak("ropensci/universe")

title: universe
text: Use runiverse::add() opt-package repository (modify options('repos') list). details see documentation runiverse::add().
code: # Install a package from r-universe universe::add("ropensci") install.packages("magick")

title: universe
code: library(universe) #>  #> Attaching package: 'universe' #> The following object is masked from 'package:base': #>  #>     remove universe_ls("jeroen") #>  [1] "RAppArmor" "V8"        "badgen"    "base64"    "bcrypt"    "brotli"    #>  [7] "curl"      "gpg"       "js"        "jsonlite"  "maketools" "mongolite" #> [13] "openssl"   "protolite" "rjade"     "sys"       "unix"      "webp"      #> [19] "webutils"

comment = c(ORC"| __truncated__ #>   ..$ Description       : chr "The curl() and curl_download() functions provide highly

what: Enable a package repository from r-universe — add
title: Enable a package repository from r-universe — add
text: Adds r-universe package repositories options("repos") used default install.packages(). universe already enabled, added , hence harmless call function multiple times.

title: Enable a package repository from r-universe — add
code: add(universe = "ropensci")  remove(universe)

title: Enable a package repository from r-universe — add
text: universe vector name(s) universe(s), .e. subdomain part https://ropensci.r-universe.dev.

title: Enable a package repository from r-universe — add
text: updated list repositories

title: Enable a package repository from r-universe — add
text: Note changes options permanent. automatically enable repository every R session, can call function ~/.Rprofile script.

title: Enable a package repository from r-universe — add
code: if (FALSE) { # interactive() add("ropensci") }

title: All universes — everyone
text: universes

title: All universes — everyone
code: everyone(type = c("all", "universes", "maintainers"))

title: All universes — everyone
text: type Type universe query: "", organizations ("universe"), personal accounts ("maintainer").

title: All universes — everyone
text: character vector universes.

title: All universes — everyone
code: if (FALSE) { # interactive() head(everyone()) }

title: Search among all universes — global_search
text: Search among universes

title: Search among all universes — global_search
code: global_search(query, limit = 100L)

title: Search among all universes — global_search
text: query Query string. See R-universe docs. limit Number results return (integer length 1)

title: Search among all universes — global_search
text: list query results. total field indicates total number results can used limit value second call.

title: Search among all universes — global_search
code: if (FALSE) { # interactive() global_search(query = '"weather data"', limit = 1) global_search(query = 'needs:httr2', limit = 1) }

title: Download snapshot — repo_snapshot
text: Downloads full copy (snapshot) R package repository.

title: Download snapshot — repo_snapshot
code: repo_snapshot(repo, destdir = "snapshot", bin_versions = r_version())  r_version()

title: Download snapshot — repo_snapshot
text: repo url cran-like repository snapshot destdir save snapshots (path). bin_versions vector versions R download win/mac binary packages. default download binaries local version. Set NULL download binaries.

title: Download snapshot — repo_snapshot
text: None, used side-effects.

title: Download snapshot — repo_snapshot
code: if (FALSE) { # interactive() repo_snapshot(   "https://jeroen.r-universe.dev",    bin_versions = c("4.1", "4.2", "4.3") ) }

what: universe: Tools for Working with R-universe <https://r-universe.dev> — universe-package
title: universe: Tools for Working with R-universe <https://r-universe.dev> — universe-package
text: Utilities interact R-universe platform. Includes functions manage local package repositories, well API wrappers retrieving data metadata packages r-universe.

title: universe: Tools for Working with R-universe <https://r-universe.dev> — universe-package
text: Maintainer: Jeroen Ooms jeroenooms@gmail.com (ORCID) Authors: Maëlle Salmon maelle.salmon@yahoo.se (ORCID)
